data.title: Sant'Antonio di Gallura
data.meta_description: Are you looking for company specialised in the design of wooden roofs? Trust Artedile located in Sant'Antonio di Gallura: call us!
data.text:
Artedile has a long and solid experience in the design and construction of wooden structures such as pergolas, verandas, roofs, gazebos and many other elements that can be customised to decorate your home, villa or workplace. Our company is located in Sant'Antonio di Gallura, in the province of Sassari, and works above all in the Costa Smeralda area. Artedile offers a vast choice of handcrafted wooden roofs which are made with the best materials that the market offers.

If you wish to find out more about our range of products, or request personalised advice to design and create woodwork for your spaces, contact our office on Via Danimarca 4, in Sant'Antonio di Gallura.

For years Artedile, founded and run by Giovanni Pidinchedda, has been working in the design and handcraft production of wooden structures of all kinds, in particular gazebos, pergolas, roofs, false ceilings, screens and iron structures. We also specialise in the building sector, dealing in particular with the construction and renovation of villas and apartments.

Thanks to the wide range of wooden roofs that we are able to create and to our experience and expertise in the building sector, our company is a real point of reference in Sardinia and in Costa Smeralda. Artedile operates in various locations, including Arzachena, Porto Cervo, Cannigione, Baja Sardinia, Palau, Santa Teresa di Gallura, San Teodoro and Budoni.

Over the years, Artedile and its staff have become a point of reference for a very homogeneous clientele united by the desire to enrich, personalise and enhance their spaces with high-value wooden structures and handicraft works.

Craftsmen, businesses, individuals and designers have long relied on our extensive experience. Our goal has always been to satisfy your needs by providing customised designs and solutions, targeted consultancy based on individual needs and high-quality standards and results.
